name: PIX EGG - RARE EGG
description:
Welcome to V1 PIX! 

Burn me to receive a generative 1/1 PIX in your wallet about 48 hours later.

You can burn items before burning the egg in order to hatch a PIX with equipped items.

If you send $EVIL or $DARK tokens to address "sacrifice.tez" before burning, your next burned egg will be supercharged and receive special powers, traits and graphic effects.

Chances to receive epic traits depend on the amount of token you send to sacrifice.tez
1.000 $EVIL or 1.000 $DARK will grant you 100% chance of receiving epic traits.

These tokens also improve chances to receive better items when hatching with equipped items.

EVIL and DARK traits are DIFFERENT. Try each one!

Egg rarities have multiple effects:
-More chances to drop rare traits like specialheads, and epic traits like the evil wings
-Better items, and better item qualities
-More chances to receive Perks at birth, like being a mecha, ghost, or holy PIX
-More chances to receive Items at birth
-More chances to be an Immortal, meaning you can burn the PIX as much as you want, to change its cloth
-Special frames depending on egg rarity
-The Evil egg is special.

Don't worry, there's a little chance to receive ANY trait even if you don't sacrifice tokens.

Hatch process is manually triggered and may take up to 48 hours.

Your PIX may also receive Perks, changing its properties and user interactions.

Check out every pix with their score, the collection, and other hatch informations and rules on our website: >>>> https://the_pix.xyz/ <<<<

You can also join our PIX community, 
on Discord: https://discord.gg/aE4EvY8TfK 
and Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/VeAH-g9TcwMxMzdk

Follow @ThePIX_tez to get more informations about traits rarity, new items and other crazy stuff!
